tool_description: Generate documents automatically, secure PDFs, and centralize document retention.
name: Inkit
title: Inkit

api_list.name: /v1/render/{renderId}

required_parameters.name: renderId
required_parameters.description: Your Render Id. You receive this in the response of a Render create call

api_list.name: /v1/render/{renderId}/pdf

required_parameters.name: renderId

api_list.name: /v1/render
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://inkit1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/render"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inkit1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://inkit1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/render"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "inkit1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
